title: Road 47 2013 720p Bluray Dual
description:
In World War II, Brazil was ally of the United States, Britain and France. At the time, it was sent more than 25,000 soldiers of the FEB (Brazilian Expeditionary Force) to fight the enemies, represented by Axis:. Germany, Italy and Japan almost all from poor backgrounds and mostly unprepared for battle, the small squares They had to learn in practice to fight for survival. After suffering a collective panic attack at the foot of Castle Hill, the soldiers GuimarÃƒÂ£es (Daniel de Oliveira), Lieutenant (Julio Andrade), PiauÃƒÂ­ (Francisco Gaspar) and Laurindo (Thogum) try to down the mountain, but end up losing the others. When they can be reunited, they must decide whether to return to the battalion and run the risk of facing a court martial for gas abandonment, or return to the previous night's position and risk to face a surprise attack of the enemy. You know when the journalist Rui (Ivo Canelas), which tells of an active minefield and they think that this is the chance to redeem themselves who committed the blunder, but much is yet to happen and the war is far from over.
